sections.comments: This section of the course is ONLINE- distance education. Your instructor and course support staff will contact you by email prior to and during the course. Please ensure you have a valid email account.  You will need your Campus Wide Login (CWL) to login to your course at https://www.elearning.ubc.ca/ . Course materials must be ordered or picked up at the UBC Bookstore. More information can be found under Distance  Learning at : http://ctlt.ubc.ca/It is important to be sure that your distance course is eligible under the student loan program.  For your reference: http://www.students.ubc.ca/finance/loans.cfm?page=courseloads.Where applicable, please visit this site for examination information: http://www.students.ubc.ca/coursesreg/exams/

description: Introduction to the economics of production, distribution and consumption of goods and services produced by, and dependent on, the forest resource. Available only through Distance Education.
